title: Imam Mahdi (ajtfs)
text: As-salāmu ʿalayka yā ḥujjata Allāhi ʿalā khalqih
As-salāmu ʿalayka yā nūra Allāhi fī arḍih
As-salāmu ʿalayka yā amīna Allāhi ʿalā waḥyih
As-salāmu ʿalayka yā baqiyyata Allāhi min awliyāʾih wa ḥujajih
As-salāmu ʿalayka wa ʿalā ābāʾika aṭ-ṭāhirīn
As-salāmu ʿalayka wa ʿalā aṣḥābika wa anṣārika wa aḥbābika wa ashyiāʿika
As-salāmu ʿalayka wa ʿalā man tuḥibbu as-salāmu ʿalayh
